meanings.definition: A person who puts forward a proposal or suggestion.
meanings.sent1: The proposers presented their idea at the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The school board members were the proposers of the new policy.
meanings.sent3: The proposers of the bake sale forgot to bring any cookies!
meanings.sent4: The proposers of the plan were like bees buzzing around a hive.
meanings.sent5: The young proposers were full of excitement and hope for their project.

meanings.definition: Those who make a formal offer or bid.
meanings.sent1: The proposers submitted their bid for the construction project.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agents were the proposers in the property auction.
meanings.sent3: The proposers at the charity auction accidentally bid on a toaster for $1000!
meanings.sent4: The proposers in the stock market were like players in a high-stakes game.
meanings.sent5: The experienced proposers knew how to make a compelling offer to win the contract.
